abstract: In a rare interview, Bill Campbell talks about his role as an adviser to RockMelt and how the rivalry between Google and Apple forced him to stop advising Google.
snippet: In a rare interview, Bill Campbell talks about his role as an adviser to RockMelt and how the rivalry between Google and Apple forced him to stop advising Google.
lead_paragraph: In Silicon Valley, where even mid-level executives seem to be escorted by public relations handlers, Bill Campbell is a bit of an exception. An elder statesman of the tech industry, he prefers to remain out of the limelight.

headline.main: Bill Campbell on Coaching RockMelt and Google vs. Apple
